channel.title: FireFox FTP Client!
channel.description:
FireFTP is a free, secure, cross-platform FTP client for Mozilla Firefox which provides easy and intuitive access to FTP servers. Along with transferring your files quickly and efficiently, FireFTP also includes more advanced features such as: directory comparison, syncing directories while navigating, SSL encryption, file hashing, and much more! Works with: Firefox 1.5 - 2.0.0.* ALL
Im downloading this im sure this will be easier than most clients in my opinion seeing as its built in :). Download Link: http://releases.mozilla.org/pub/mozilla.org/extensions/fireftp/fireftp-0.94.6-fx.xpi

item.title: FireFox FTP Client!
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

ive used that for about a year works really nice

only downside

u have to type in the drive letter if u want to switch drives and if a folder doesnt exist and u type it in it goes into an infinate loop

Read full topic
